error.dirPathConflict: A directory with the same name already exists at this location.

delete.label: Delete property
delete.description: This will delete the property from the collection and remove it from all collection entries. This can't be undone.

number.name: Number
number.description: A number with various formatting options.

date.name: Date
date.description: A date and time field with various formatting options.

toggle.name: Toggle
toggle.description: An on/off value which can be represented as a checkbox, switch, or icon.

image.name: Image
image.description: An image file or reference to an image item type.

multiselect.name: Multiselect
multiselect.description: A dropdown list of options with multiple selection.

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: An icon picker for selecting an icon.

markdown.name: Formatted text
markdown.description: Richly formatted text edited using a text editor.

created.name: Created date
created.description: Adds the date and time at which an entry was created to its properties.

lastModified.name: Last modified date
lastModified.description: Adds the date and time at which an entry was last modified to its properties.

errors.typeNameConflict: An item type with this name already exists
errors.itemNameConflict: An item type with this name already exists
errors.pathConflict: A folder with this name already exists in the workspace

file.name: File
file.description: A file of a specific type.
